lines: Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ubuhle balo yize;
Uthando lweNkosi lumi, Yilo njalo phakade.
Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Isiduduzo sami;
Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ngi mbon’ emomotheka;
Khuthi ohambweni lwami Ngi qinise kukhanya.
Thath’ izwe u ngiph’ uJesu Ng’thembel’ es’phambanweni;
Ngize ngi bone obala Si bhekana noJesu.
